step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well, but try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This looks great for stretching your chest and shoulders.
Holding steady! Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Nicely done reversing the motion. You're returning to the starting position smoothly.
Second rep starting strong! Hands clasped and ready.
Good movement here. Focus on keeping those elbows relatively close as you lift towards your forehead.
Great work spreading your elbows wide behind your head again. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the position well. Keep that upright posture and avoid any forward strain.
Perfectly reversed motion. You're completing the exercise with good control.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows closer together when raising your hands and maintaining an upright head position throughout. This helps maximize the shoulder and chest stretch for better lymph movement.
